MAN.TITLE: add_palette
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Add an entry in the Scicos palettes list

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : a character string, the palette title
: a character string, the path of the scicos file associated with the palette

DESCRIPTION.P: This function adds a new entry in the Scicos palettes list. The palette should be executed by a Scilab script file. If the given title already exists in the palette list associated with the same file nothing is done. The function checks if the file exist.

MAN.AUTHOR: Serge Steer , INRIA
